criteria: Contribution to household tasks and responsibilities.
Understanding of family needs and dynamics.
descriptions: No contribution or plan to help at home.
Minimal contribution with prompting; plan lacks detail and consistency.
Some contribution with occasional prompting; plan includes a few tasks but may not be consistently followed.
Regular contribution to household tasks; plan includes a variety of tasks and is mostly followed.
Significant contribution to household responsibilities; plan is comprehensive, well-organized, and consistently followed.
Exceptional contribution, independently takes initiative; plan demonstrates a deep understanding of family needs and is executed flawlessly.
Shows little responsibility and requires constant supervision.
Generally responsible and reliable; requires occasional reminders.
Consistently responsible and reliable; takes ownership of tasks.
Exemplary responsibility; proactively seeks out opportunities to help and consistently exceeds expectations.
Basic understanding of common family needs.
Good understanding of general family needs and dynamics.
Clear understanding of specific family needs and demonstrates empathy.
Exceptional understanding of family needs, anticipates challenges, and offers solutions.
